channel.title: Are you addicted?[CHALLENGE]
channel.description:
Name three items you are addicted to. Here are mine:
-Pornography -Popping my knuckles -Masturbation -Biting my nails
Now... for ONE week do NOT do any of these addictions. I was listening to some guy today tell me about how life is so full of new adventures and new things to learn but we get so situated with the same routine that we never go out there and find new things we may like.
I CHALLENGE all members of this community for one week to not do anything related to your addiction. I.e. with me I will NOT watch any pornography, dvd nor online. I will not view any magazines of nudity nor audio clips.
But I am curious now... does this include masturbation? .. Guess it may be a good idea to include that in mine 0.0

item.title: Are you addicted?[CHALLENGE]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:85, topic:442781"][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=545466.msg3998560#msg3998560 date=1337629759]
99% of you don’t have addictions. Change the thread title. No one here has a physical dependency on “porn” or “programming”.
[/quote]
Have you ever read the definition of addiction? Because you are so wrong that you should…[/quote]
I’m pretty sure I have. And I don’t need a definition to tell me what something is. What do YOU believe an addiction is?

Read full topic

item.title: Are you addicted?[CHALLENGE]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:79, topic:442781”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=545466.msg3999653#msg3999653 date=1337784122]

It does but honestly, what else is there to do but run, work, go to school, watch anime, play video games (at least the last two for me)?

Honestly, I want to do something more but I have to get out of my parents house first and that’s only gonna happen once I get into college this fall.

I feel the same exact way. I’m always eager to get home from school and track practice, even though they contain most of the fun in my day. I’ve been REALLY bored at home lately whenever I’m there, so I usually end up going to a friend’s house or something. Yesterday I got home, ate food, played drums for an hour and a half, cut the grass, then sat online for the next 5 hours doing nothing productive really…Your schedule is about exactly the same as mine.

I find myself browsing 4chan and forums a lot more. I did have a girl I was working toward a relationship with, but that went to crap, so I have nothing to do anymore besides sit depressed in my room. It sucks! I really need to brainstorm some ideas that can keep my occupied or I’ll go nuts.
[/quote]
Same for me… I want a job but it means I have to go out and actually walk around, when i all i want to do is stay at my house all day[/quote]

My job shift is only 2.5 hours long right now, and I only work weekends because of track practice. I’ll be starting another job during the summer though, but still, I really hope my summer is not boring.

Read full topic

[quote author=tinyscape link=topic=545466.msg3999198#msg3999198 date=1337721020]

after dis challenge loveand will notice a huge increase in his sperm count.
[/quote]LOL

you will probably be right day #3 have any idea how torturous it’s been for me ?
[/quote]I’ve not masturbated in over a month, beat that biatch. Love you <3

I’ve not masturbated since last night. But I’m not really trying to stop. I don’t see a problem with jerking thrice daily.

You can get sores near the base of the head of your penis. That hurts.[/quote]You two are making it quite hard :x

no pun intended you sick freaks :x

so far so good though. I didn’t pop my knuckles anymore today and so far no porn killing me though. You know that feeling when you wake up to go to the restroom and you come back to your bedroom and your junior is still away? xD
